EmailTemplate.name: SW: Both Not Attending PIE
EmailTemplate.subject: SW: Both YPPG and SW unable to attend PIE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
{!Contact.Name} and their Support worker are both unable to attend the PIE; please arrange an alternative meeting.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever both the YPPG and SW are unable to attend the PIE.
